Summary[edit]

English: Official Flag of Ontario since 1965
Español: La bandera oficial de Ontario desde 1965
Filipino: Opisyal na watawat ng Ontario mula pa noong 1965
Français : Le drapeau officiel de l'Ontario depuis 1965
Русский: Флаг Онтарио
Tagalog: Opisyal na watawat ng Ontario mula pa noong 1965

For more information, see Government of Ontario, About Ontario: Emblems and Symbols.

Drawn and adapted by E Pluribus Anthony from and in accordance with above noted website.


This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.
